Package peregrine.util.netty

Extensions and additional code for using Netty and async IO.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ByteReadable Read one byte at a time and advance the current position.
ChannelBufferWritable Tag interface for anything that can accept the write of a channel buffer.
ChannelBufferWritableWithLength  
PrefetchReaderListener  
StreamReaderListener  
 

Class Summary
BackedChannelBufferWritable A regular ChannelBufferWritable but backed by a ChannelBuffer.
BaseDaemon Provides general services and infrastructure for peregrine daemons (worker and controller).
BootstrapFactory  
BufferedChannelBufferWritable Buffer output until it is ready to be sent in one CHUNK.
BufferedChannelBufferWritableWithChecksums A BufferedChannelBufferWritable but every time we flush the buffer we convert it to use a checksum.
ChannelBufferCharSequence Char sequence backed by a file ChannelBuffer.
ChannelBufferUtils Provides tools for manipulating ChannelBuffers.
CloseableByteBufferBackedChannelBuffer Wrap a channel buffer so that we can close it and reads will fail.
DefaultChannelUpstreamHandler Some additional functionality for channel handlers required for Peregrine.
DirectChannelBufferFactory  
FileCharSequence Char seq backed by a file.
HeapChannelBufferWritable  
HttpResponses Provides various functions for sending HTTP responses(OK, NOT_FOUND, etc)
MultiChannelBufferWritable Write each value to N output streams.
PrefetchReader Takes a given set of files and listens to a StreamReader and mlocks pages and then requests that they be read.
SlabDynamicChannelBuffer A dynamic capacity buffer which increases its capacity as needed.
StreamReader Class which restricts the usage of a ChannelBuffer to JUST relative sequential read operations.
 

Package peregrine.util.netty Description

Extensions and additional code for using Netty and async IO.
